duties_responsibilities.duty: Partner with Operations Manager to ensure attainment of financial and operating goals.
Gather, analyze and interpret external and internal data and provide recommendations for improvements in revenue, cost efficiency, and asset utilization.
Oversee inventory controls, analyze production costs and develop cost standards for materials and labor.
Work closely with the Procurement Department to ensure all purchasing agreements are in line with the desired specifications and budgeted costs.
Analyze profitability and identify areas in need of improvement.
Review contracts; ensure in compliance with Company requirements.
Ensure the division complies with company policies as well as local, state & federal laws.
Provide recommendations to improve processes and procedures.
Work closely with Credit Department to minimize risk and make credit decisions.
Assist Accounting Dept on the monthly closing process.
Review and analyze financial statements and prepare analysis of monthly results with Operations Management.
Prepare monthly forecasts and annual budgets.
Monitor risk matters and coordinate with insurance brokers and senior management.
Perform other job-related duties as assigned.

education_certification.credential: BS/BA in Business Management or relevant field; MS/MA will be a plus.
